title: The Lush Twang Of Dobro-Times-Three In 'Three Bells'
teaser: The dobro is a fretless guitar that gives country and bluegrass its unique twang. NPR's Wade Goodwyn talks to Jerry Douglas and Rob Ickes about their new album, Three Bells.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
